titles.title: SAND Act of 2023
Sand Acquisition, Nourishment, and Development Act of 2023
SAND Act of 2023
A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to modify a provision relating to acquisition of beach fill.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Sand Acquisition, Nourishment, and Development Act of 2023 or the SAND Act of 2023
This bill allows the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to acquire fill material for beach erosion and nourishment purposes from non-domestic sources even if such materials are available from domestic sources.
